III. Objectives and Proceduress The principal objective of
this project is to develop and make available information and material
relative to the improvement or development of classroom utilization of
educational broadcasts. The project is proposed to be carried out in
four phases. Each of these are considered below.
PHASE 1 - Exploratory
This phase would serve three purposes. The first of these would
be to locate and evaluate educational broadcast utilization materials
now in existence. The second purpose would be to locate places and peo¬
ple who are working with teachers in the development of utilization and
are able to develop new utilization materials, and third to develop spe¬
cific plans for the production of materials not now available.
